verses.verse: Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> To The Elect <S%G1588><s%> Sojourners <S%G3927><s%> Of The Dispersion <S%G1290><s%> Of Pontus, <S%G4195><s%> Of Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> Of Cappadocia, <S%G2587><s%> Of Asia, <S%G773><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bithynia, <S%G978><s%>

According To The <S%G2596><s%> Foreknowledge <S%G4268><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> The Father, <S%G3962><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Sanctification <S%G38><s%> Of The Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Unto The <S%G1519><s%> Obedience <S%G5218><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sprinkling <S%G4473><s%> Of The Blood <S%G129><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ : <S%G5547><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> Be Multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> Be The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4183><s%> His Great <S%G846><s%> Mercy <S%G1656><s%> Begat Again <S%G313><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Hope <S%G1680><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> ' Through The <S%G1223><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> The Dead <S%G3498><s%>

To <S%G1519><s%> An Inheritance <S%G2817><s%> Incorruptible <S%G862><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Undefiled <S%G283><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unfading, <S%G263><s%> Reserved <S%G5083><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The Power <S%G1411><s%> Of God Are <S%G2316><s%> Being Guarded <S%G5432><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> Ready <S%G2092><s%> To Be Revealed <S%G601><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Last. <S%G2078><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> Wherein <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Ye Exult, <S%G21><s%> For A Little While <S%G3641><s%> At Present, <S%G737><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Necessary <S%G1163><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> Having Been Put To Grief <S%G3076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Various <S%G4164><s%> Trials, <S%G3986><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Proving <S%G1383><s%> Of Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> More Precious <S%G5093><s%> Than Gold <S%G5553><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Perishes, <S%G622><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> Though <S%G1161><s%> Being Proved, <S%G1381><s%> Be Found <S%G2147><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Praise <S%G1868><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glory, <S%G1391><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Revelation <S%G602><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> Ye Love : <S%G25><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> Though Not <S%G3361><s%> Looking, <S%G3708><s%> <S%G4100><s%> But Believing, <S%G1161><s%> Ye Exult <S%G21><s%> With Joy <S%G5479><s%> Unspeakable <S%G412><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glorified, <S%G1392><s%>
Receiving <S%G2865><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Of Your Faith, <S%G5216><s%> The Salvation <S%G4991><s%> Of Your Souls; <S%G5590><s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> Sought Out <S%G1567><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Searched Out <S%G1830><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Prophesied; <S%G4395><s%>

Searching <S%G2045><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> What Manner Of <S%G4169><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Was Signifying <S%G1213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Testifying Beforehand <S%G4303><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5547><s%> Belonging To Christ Sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> Glories; <S%G1391><s%>

To Whom <S%G3739><s%> It Was Revealed, <S%G601><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> To Themselves <S%G1438><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Were Serving <S%G1247><s%> Those Things, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Were Announced <S%G312><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Announced The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To You <S%G5209><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Desire <S%G1937><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> To Look. <S%G3879><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Having Girded Up <S%G328><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Loins <S%G3751><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1271><s%> Of Your Mind, <S%G5216><s%> Being Sober, <S%G3525><s%> Perfectly <S%G5049><s%> Hope <S%G1679><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Being Brought <S%G5342><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The Revelation <S%G602><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Of Obedience, <S%G5218><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Fashioning Yourselves <S%G4964><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Former <S%G4386><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ignorance <S%G52><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Desires; <S%G1939><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> According As <S%G2596><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Is Holy, <S%G40><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Yourselves <S%G846><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All Your <S%G3956><s%> Conduct <S%G391><s%> Be Ye; <S%G1096><s%>
Because <S%G1360><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> , Be Ye, <S%G1096><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Holy 40 A-NSM Am. 1510 V-PXI-1S

And <S%G2532><s%> If As <S%G1487><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Ye Call On <S%G1941><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Without Regard Of Persons <S%G678><s%> Judges <S%G2919><s%> According <S%G2596><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Of Each <S%G1538><s%> Work, <S%G2041><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3940><s%> Of Your Sojourn <S%G5216><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> Pass Ye, <S%G390><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> By Corruptible Things, <S%G5349><s%> By Silver <S%G694><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> By Gold, <S%G5553><s%> Ye Were Redeemed <S%G3084><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3152><s%> Your Vain <S%G5216><s%> Manner Of Life <S%G391><s%> Handed Down From Your Fathers, <S%G3970><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> By Precious <S%G5093><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Of A Lamb <S%G286><s%> Without Blemish <S%G299><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Without Spot The Blood <S%G784><s%> Of Christ : <S%G5547><s%>

Having Been Foreknown <S%G4267><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Before The <S%G4253><s%> Foundation <S%G2602><s%> Of The World, <S%G2889><s%> <S%G5319><s%> But Manifested <S%G1161><s%> ' At <S%G1909><s%> The Last <S%G2078><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Times <S%G5550><s%> ' For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Gave, <S%G1325><s%> So As For <S%G5620><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Your Faith <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Your Souls <S%G5216><s%> Having Purified <S%G48><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Obedience <S%G5218><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Through The <S%G1223><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Brotherly Love <S%G5360><s%> Unfeigned, <S%G505><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> A Heart <S%G2588><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> Love Ye <S%G25><s%> Fervently. <S%G1619><s%>

Having Been Begotten Again, <S%G313><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Seed <S%G4701><s%> Corruptible, <S%G5349><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of Incorruptible, <S%G862><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The Word <S%G3056><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Abiding <S%G3306><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For Ever. <S%G165><s%>

Because <S%G1360><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Flesh Is <S%G4561><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Grass, <S%G5528><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All The <S%G3956><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> As The <S%G5613><s%> Flower <S%G438><s%> Of Grass. <S%G5528><s%> Withered <S%G3583><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grass, <S%G5528><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flower <S%G438><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> Fell Away; <S%G1601><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But The Word <S%G4487><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Abides <S%G3306><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For Ever. <S%G165><s%> <S%G5124><s%> But This <S%G1161><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G4487><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Announced <S%G2097><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>
